REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to retaliation against other jurisdictions which discriminate against hiring New York state residents
Summary: Relates to retaliation against other jurisdictions which discriminate against hiring New York state residents.
LawCode: Add ยง13, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to retaliation against other jurisdictions which discriminate against hiring New York state residents
